text:
Almost `rm -rf *`’d my homedir, because I thought I was in a different directory.
Luckily I swapped to using `trash -f *`  ages ago, which just sends things the the recycle bin

text: Once I recursively tarballed my home dir - it sucked. it broke bash and I had to go into julia to fix it. FYI Julia's terminal commands do not rely .. directly on Bash or something. Just a quick life saving tip.

elements.text: Once I recursively tarballed my home dir - it sucked. it broke bash and I had to go into julia to fix it. FYI Julia's terminal commands do not rely .. directly on Bash or something. Just a quick life saving tip.

text: This might end up being the most useful thing I learn in my entire programming career
